general.description: General purpose prompts for common development tasks

prompts.name: Commit
prompts.description: Execute the mandatory commit procedure with all required pre-commit checks

prompts.name: Fix Tests
prompts.description: Diagnose and fix failing tests using Cortex MCP tools, outside of the full commit pipeline

prompts.name: Fix Quality
prompts.description: Resolve type, lint, formatting, and other quality issues using Cortex MCP tools

prompts.name: Docs Sync
prompts.description: Synchronize documentation and memory bank state using Cortex MCP tools, without running the full commit pipeline

prompts.name: Review
prompts.description: Comprehensive code review to find bugs, inconsistencies, and incomplete implementations

prompts.name: Implement
prompts.description: Read the roadmap, identify the next pending step, and implement it completely

prompts.name: Plan
prompts.description: Create a development plan based on user description, add it to plans directory, and update roadmap

prompts.name: Analyze
prompts.description: End-of-session analysis: check all (context effectiveness and session optimization). Single entry point replacing analyze-context-effectiveness and analyze-session-optimization.
